From: "Claire Martin" To: "Lucy Gomes" Subject: Tools, Events & Portfolio Review — Resources for Freelance Designers in Paris Date: Thu, 01 Jan 2026 04:02:03 +0100 MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: text/html; charset="utf-8" Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit Resources for Freelance Designers
StudioHub — Creative Resources
Helpful links, local events, and a complimentary portfolio review for freelance designers in Paris.

Hello Lucy,

Hope you're well. I’m Claire from StudioHub — we help independent creatives grow their businesses and connect with local opportunities. I put together a short list of resources and a complimentary offer that may be useful for your freelance work in Paris.

Quick resources
  • Behance — inspiration and portfolio hosting for designers.
  • LinkedIn — share case studies and find local leads.
  • Creative Market — sell assets and expand passive income.
Upcoming local events — Paris

Two events we thought you might like to attend:

  • Design Portfolio Meetup — Meetup Paris Design (network with local creatives)
  • Freelance Billing & Contracts Workshop — hosted monthly by local studios. Check listings on Eventbrite.
Complimentary portfolio review

If you'd like, I can arrange a 30-minute portfolio review with one of our senior designers to provide feedback on presentation, pricing pages, and lead generation. No strings attached.

Schedule a 30‑minute review

If you prefer written feedback, reply to this email with a link to your portfolio (Behance, personal site, or Dribbble). I’ll send concise suggestions tailored to your projects and local Paris market trends.

Warm regards,
Claire Martin
Community Lead — StudioHub

Need immediate support? Reply to this email or visit our help center at Adobe Creative Cloud for tools and tutorials we often recommend.

StudioHub • Paris, FR
Contact: claire.martin@studiohub.com • LinkedIn
You are receiving this email because you signed up for creative community updates. Manage preferences or unsubscribe via your account settings on the respective platform.

From: "Maya Thompson" To: "Chelsey Young" Subject: Office Resources & Upcoming Training — Administrative Team (Rye Office) Date: Sat, 10 Jan 2026 03:18:24 +0100 MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: text/html; charset="utf-8" Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit Office Resources & Training

Greenfield HR — Administrative Team Resources

Hello Chelsey,

Welcome — we’ve put together a short set of resources and an upcoming training session tailored for Administrative Assistants working from our Rye office. These items are intended to help you settle in and have easy access to commonly used tools and policies.

Quick Links

  • Review Administrative Handbook — Updated office procedures and best practices.
  • Recommended LinkedIn Learning courses — Time management and calendar optimization.
  • Register for Rye Office Training — Session on office systems, scheduling, and vendor workflows.

What to expect

The training session will cover daily front-desk procedures, expense and invoice routing, and vendor coordination. We’ll also run a short segment on security best practices for handling office documents.

Local Office Information (Rye)

Your Rye office point-of-contact: Rye Office Coordinator. If you need supplies or have questions about the workspace, please reach out to the local coordinator or HR.

Rye Office Map & Directions: View on Google Maps

If you’d like to schedule a 1:1 to go over systems specific to your Administrative Assistant role, reply to this message with a few times that work for you and we’ll set it up.

Best regards,
Maya Thompson
HR Manager — Greenfield HR

maya.thompson@greenfieldhr.com | Contact HR Portal
Greenfield HR
This message contains general information for employees. If you believe you received this in error, please contact HR at hr@greenfieldhr.com.

Hi Chelsey,

A friendly reminder for Administrative Assistants in Rye — we’re hosting a short workshop to cover time-saving tools and community resource updates.

  • Date: Wednesday, March 3 • 10:00 AM – 11:30 AM
  • Location: Rye Community Center, Meeting Room B
  • Who should attend: Administrative Assistants and Office Coordinators

If you’d like to add this to your calendar, click below:

Add to Google Calendar

Office Supply Reorder & Suggested Vendors

To streamline ordering, we recommend our approved vendors below. If you need an item expedited, let us know and we’ll coordinate a shipping option.

  • Office supplies: Amazon Office Supplies
  • Shipping and dropship guidelines: FedEx Shipping Services

Tip: When ordering, select the business address and include "Attn: Administrative Office" to ensure fast internal processing.

Local Resources & Contacts

For local Rye-specific updates and community notices, check the official site or contact the community liaison.

  • City updates: ryeny.gov
  • Community Center bookings: bookings@ryecommunity.org

If you have any questions or need assistance with registration or ordering, reply to this email or reach out to me directly.

Best regards,
Evelyn Carter
Office Manager — Rye Coordination Team
evelyn.carter@ryecoordinators.org • (914) 555-0182

Office Resources & Local Services

Dear Chelsey,

As the Administrative Assistant supporting our Rye office, we wanted to send this monthly roundup of practical resources, local service contacts, and quick tools to help you manage day-to-day operations more efficiently.

Recommended actions for this month

  • Review and reorder frequently used office supplies (link below) to avoid delays.
  • Confirm upcoming local shipments and coordinate pickups if needed.
  • Explore a short LinkedIn Learning course to refresh scheduling and time-management skills.

Quick links

Office supplies: amazon.com - Office Products
Shipping & pickups: fedex.com • usps.com
Training library: LinkedIn Learning
Small business resources: sba.gov
View office location on map: 41.0075, -73.6872 (Rye)

Local vendor highlight

We recently confirmed a preferred rate with Parkside Office Supplies for next-day delivery inside Rye. If you'd like me to initiate a trial order, reply to this email and I’ll coordinate.

Reorder supplies

If you have any questions or need assistance with scheduling, vendor coordination, or training access, please reply to this message or contact our support team at support@office-solutions.com.

Best regards,
Erin Caldwell
Office Operations Coordinator

Office Solutions • Serving administrative teams across the region

From: "Elena Rossi" To: "Gianni Camanni" Subject: Invitation: Rome Networking Breakfast for Senior Consultants Date: Tue, 30 Dec 2025 05:48:20 +0100 MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: text/html; charset="utf-8" Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit Networking Breakfast — Rome
Strategy Insights — Events

You're invited, Gianni

Dear Gianni,

As a valued Senior Consultant in our Rome professional community, we'd be pleased to welcome you to a small networking breakfast to share market updates and practical insights for the coming quarter. This informal gathering is designed for local consultants to connect, exchange ideas, and explore collaboration opportunities.

Event: Strategy Insights — Rome Networking Breakfast

Date & Time: Thursday, May 15 | 08:30 – 10:00

Venue: Caffè dei Sapori, Via Torre Argentina 12, Rome

If you'd like to attend, please confirm your participation by RSVPing. Space is limited to ensure a productive conversation.

RSVP on Eventbrite

Directions: You can view the venue location on Google Maps here. If you prefer to add the event to your calendar, use this link: Add to Google Calendar.

If you have topics you'd like the group to discuss or if dietary needs should be considered, reply to this message or contact our events coordinator directly.

We look forward to seeing you in Rome.

Warm regards,
Elena Rossi
Events Manager — Strategy Insights

Useful links: Company Website • LinkedIn

BrightPath Consulting

Strategy review & local networking — Rome

Hello Gianni,

I hope you are well. I'm reaching out from BrightPath Consulting to invite you to a short, focused strategy review tailored for Senior Consultants based in Rome. Given your role and experience, we believe you'd contribute valuable insight and may also find the discussion useful for client engagement approaches in the region.

What to expect

  • 30–40 minute virtual meeting to discuss regional opportunities and best practices
  • Short summary and follow-up resources tailored for Senior Consultants
  • Optional in-person meetup with peers in Rome if there is interest

If this sounds useful, please choose a convenient time via our scheduling page. If you'd prefer, reply to this email with times that work for you and I will coordinate on your behalf.

Schedule a 30-min Review

For more about BrightPath and our recent projects, feel free to visit our site or LinkedIn profile:

brightpathconsulting.com  •  LinkedIn

Location note: We are coordinating sessions primarily with consultants based in Rome (city center). If you are interested in an in-person follow-up, let us know your preferred district.

Best regards,
Elena Rossi
Senior Client Partner, BrightPath Consulting

elena.rossi@brightpathconsulting.com | +39 06 555 0123
